description: This file defines data models related to food delivery menu items, including restaurants, menu categories, options, variant groups, add-on groups, menu items, item configurations, and cart lines. It also includes functions to compute the total options delta in cents and generate a human-readable summary of the selected options.

classes.name: Restaurant
classes.description: Represents a restaurant shown on the Home screen.

classes.name: MenuCategory
classes.description: Represents a menu category within a restaurant.

classes.name: OptionItem
classes.description: A single selectable option belonging to either a VariantGroup or AddOnGroup, including its price delta.

classes.name: VariantGroup
classes.description: Single-select groups such as size or spice level, with options and requirement flag.

classes.name: AddOnGroup
classes.description: Multi-select groups such as extra toppings or sides, with options and selection constraints.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Represents a menu item available for order, including associated variant and add-on groups.

classes.name: ItemConfiguration
classes.description: Stores selected options for variants and add-ons, with a method to generate a stable key.

classes.name: CartLine
classes.description: A line item in the cart, combining a menu item, its configuration, and quantity.

methods.name: computeOptionsDeltaCents
methods.description: Calculates the total price delta in cents for selected options (variants and add-ons) of a menu item based on the current configuration.

methods.name: buildConfigurationSummary
methods.description: Creates a human-readable string summarizing the selected options for a menu item.
